title: Holiday saves the Bucks, Griz whoop the Warriors
description:
Jrue Hollllidayyyyy! Jrue comes up clutch both on offense and defense to lead the Bucks over the Celtics. Why his performance overshadows the poor play of one Boston Celtic. Listen to hear Jalen & Jacoby discuss why Marcus Smart wishes he could have that game back. Plus, Grizzlies whoop the Warriors in Memphis. Why Steph Curry wishes he could take back saying that they would whoop the Grizzlies in game 5. Find out if this series has the momentum to go to game 7. Plus, Brooklyn Nets GM speaks on Kyrie Irving and his availability for next season. Listen as the guys break down what should be the next steps for the Brooklyn GM. All that and more.  
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
